verses.kjv: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
verses.web: LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
verses.ct: The LORD spoke to Moses and said,

verses.kjv: Speak unto Aaron, and say unto him, When thou lightest the lamps, the seven lamps shall give light over against the candlestick.
verses.web: “Speak to Aaron, and tell him, ‘When you light the lamps, the seven lamps shall give light in front of the lamp stand.’ ”
verses.ct: "Tell Aaron that when he lights the lamps, all 7 lamps must cast their light forward, toward the front of the lampstand."

verses.kjv: And Aaron did so; he lighted the lamps thereof over against the candlestick, as the LORD commanded Moses.
verses.web: Aaron did so. He lit its lamps to light the area in front of the lamp stand, as LORD commanded Moses.
verses.ct: Aaron did exactly that. He lit the lamps so they shone toward the front of the lampstand, just as the LORD had commanded Moses.

verses.kjv: And this work of the candlestick was of beaten gold, unto the shaft thereof, unto the flowers thereof, was beaten work: according unto the pattern which the LORD had shewed Moses, so he made the candlestick.
verses.web: This was the workmanship of the lamp stand, beaten work of gold. From its base to its flowers, it was beaten work. He made the lamp stand according to the pattern which LORD had shown Moses.
verses.ct: The entire lampstand was made of hammered gold — from its base to its flower-shaped decorations, every detail was hammered by hand. It matched the exact pattern the LORD had shown Moses.

verses.kjv: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
verses.web: LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
verses.ct: The LORD spoke to Moses and said,

verses.kjv: Take the Levites from among the children of Israel, and cleanse them.
verses.web: “Take the Levites from among the children of Israel, and cleanse them.
verses.ct: "Set the Levites apart from the rest of the Israelites and purify them.

verses.kjv: And thus shalt thou do unto them, to cleanse them: Sprinkle water of purifying upon them, and let them shave all their flesh, and let them wash their clothes, and so make themselves clean.
verses.web: You shall do this to them, to cleanse them: sprinkle the water of cleansing on them, let them shave their whole bodies with a razor, let them wash their clothes, and cleanse themselves.
verses.ct: Here is how you will purify them: Sprinkle the water of purification on them, have them shave their entire bodies, wash their clothes, and make themselves clean.

verses.kjv: Then let them take a young bullock with his meat offering, even fine flour mingled with oil, and another young bullock shalt thou take for a sin offering.
verses.web: Then let them take a young bull and its meal offering, fine flour mixed with oil; and another young bull you shall take for a sin offering.
verses.ct: Then have them bring a young bull along with a grain offering of fine flour mixed with oil. You will also take a second young bull as a sin offering.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt bring the Levites before the tabernacle of the congregation: and thou shalt gather the whole assembly of the children of Israel together:
verses.web: You shall present the Levites before the Tent of Meeting. You shall assemble the whole congregation of the children of Israel.
verses.ct: Bring the Levites to the front of the Tent of Meeting and gather the entire Israelite community together.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt bring the Levites before the LORD: and the children of Israel shall put their hands upon the Levites:
verses.web: You shall present the Levites before LORD. The children of Israel shall lay their hands on the Levites,
verses.ct: Present the Levites before the LORD, and have the Israelites lay their hands on them.

verses.kjv: And Aaron shall offer the Levites before the LORD for an offering of the children of Israel, that they may execute the service of the LORD.
verses.web: and Aaron shall offer the Levites before LORD for a wave offering on the behalf of the children of Israel, that it may be theirs to do the service of LORD.
verses.ct: Aaron will then present the Levites before the LORD as an offering on behalf of the Israelites, so that the Levites may carry out the LORD's service.

verses.kjv: And the Levites shall lay their hands upon the heads of the bullocks: and thou shalt offer the one for a sin offering, and the other for a burnt offering, unto the LORD, to make an atonement for the Levites.
verses.web: “The Levites shall lay their hands on the heads of the bulls, and you shall offer the one for a sin offering and the other for a burnt offering to LORD, to make atonement for the Levites.
verses.ct: The Levites will lay their hands on the heads of the 2 bulls. Sacrifice one as a sin offering and the other as a burnt offering to the LORD, to make atonement for the Levites.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt set the Levites before Aaron, and before his sons, and offer them for an offering unto the LORD.
verses.web: You shall set the Levites before Aaron and before his sons, and offer them as a wave offering to LORD.
verses.ct: Have the Levites stand before Aaron and his sons, and present them as an offering to the LORD.

verses.kjv: Thus shalt thou separate the Levites from among the children of Israel: and the Levites shall be mine.
verses.web: Thus you shall separate the Levites from among the children of Israel, and the Levites shall be mine.
verses.ct: In this way you will set the Levites apart from the rest of the Israelites, and the Levites will belong to me.

verses.kjv: And after that shall the Levites go in to do the service of the tabernacle of the congregation: and thou shalt cleanse them, and offer them for an offering.
verses.web: “After that, the Levites shall go in to do the service of the Tent of Meeting. You shall cleanse them, and offer them as a wave offering.
verses.ct: Once you have purified the Levites and presented them as an offering, they may begin serving in the Tent of Meeting.

verses.kjv: For they are wholly given unto me from among the children of Israel; instead of such as open every womb, even instead of the firstborn of all the children of Israel, have I taken them unto me.
verses.web: For they are wholly given to me from among the children of Israel; instead of all who open the womb, even the firstborn of all the children of Israel, I have taken them to me.
verses.ct: They are given entirely to me from among the Israelites. I have claimed them as my own in place of every firstborn son — every child who opens the womb in Israel.

verses.kjv: For all the firstborn of the children of Israel are mine, both man and beast: on the day that I smote every firstborn in the land of Egypt I sanctified them for myself.
verses.web: For all the firstborn among the children of Israel are mine, both man and animal. On the day that I struck all the firstborn in the land of Egypt, I sanctified them for myself.
verses.ct: Every firstborn in Israel belongs to me, whether human or animal. On the day I struck down every firstborn in Egypt, I set them apart as mine.

verses.kjv: And I have taken the Levites for all the firstborn of the children of Israel.
verses.web: I have taken the Levites instead of all the firstborn among the children of Israel.
verses.ct: But I have taken the Levites as substitutes for all the firstborn among the Israelites.

verses.kjv: And I have given the Levites as a gift to Aaron and to his sons from among the children of Israel, to do the service of the children of Israel in the tabernacle of the congregation, and to make an atonement for the children of Israel: that there be no plague among the children of Israel, when the children of Israel come nigh unto the sanctuary.
verses.web: I have given the Levites as a gift to Aaron and to his sons from among the children of Israel, to do the service of the children of Israel in the Tent of Meeting, and to make atonement for the children of Israel, so that there will be no plague among the children of Israel when the children of Israel come near to the sanctuary.”
verses.ct: I have given the Levites as a gift to Aaron and his sons from among the Israelites. Their job is to serve on behalf of the Israelites at the Tent of Meeting and to make atonement for them, so that no plague will strike the Israelites when they come near the sanctuary."

verses.kjv: And Moses, and Aaron, and all the congregation of the children of Israel, did to the Levites according unto all that the LORD commanded Moses concerning the Levites, so did the children of Israel unto them.
verses.web: Moses, and Aaron, and all the congregation of the children of Israel did so to the Levites. According to all that LORD commanded Moses concerning the Levites, so the children of Israel did to them.
verses.ct: Moses, Aaron, and the entire Israelite community did everything the LORD had commanded Moses regarding the Levites. They carried it all out exactly.

verses.kjv: And the Levites were purified, and they washed their clothes; and Aaron offered them as an offering before the LORD; and Aaron made an atonement for them to cleanse them.
verses.web: The Levites purified themselves from sin, and they washed their clothes; and Aaron offered them for a wave offering before LORD and Aaron made atonement for them to cleanse them.
verses.ct: The Levites purified themselves and washed their clothes. Then Aaron presented them as an offering before the LORD and made atonement for them to make them clean.

verses.kjv: And after that went the Levites in to do their service in the tabernacle of the congregation before Aaron, and before his sons: as the LORD had commanded Moses concerning the Levites, so did they unto them.
verses.web: After that, the Levites went in to do their service in the Tent of Meeting before Aaron and before his sons: as LORD had commanded Moses concerning the Levites, so they did to them.
verses.ct: After that, the Levites began their service in the Tent of Meeting under the direction of Aaron and his sons. Everything was done just as the LORD had commanded Moses concerning the Levites.

verses.kjv: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
verses.web: LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
verses.ct: The LORD spoke to Moses and said,

verses.kjv: This is it that belongeth unto the Levites: from twenty and five years old and upward they shall go in to wait upon the service of the tabernacle of the congregation:
verses.web: “This is what is assigned to the Levites: from twenty-five years old and upward they shall go in to wait on the service in the work of the Tent of Meeting;
verses.ct: "Here is the rule for the Levites: Starting at age 25, they may begin serving in the work of the Tent of Meeting.

verses.kjv: And from the age of fifty years they shall cease waiting upon the service thereof, and shall serve no more:
verses.web: and from the age of fifty years they shall retire from doing the work, and shall serve no more,
verses.ct: But at age 50, they must step back from their regular duties and serve no longer.

verses.kjv: But shall minister with their brethren in the tabernacle of the congregation, to keep the charge, and shall do no service. Thus shalt thou do unto the Levites touching their charge.
verses.web: but shall assist their brothers in the Tent of Meeting, to perform the duty, and shall perform no service. This is how you shall have the Levites do their duties.”
verses.ct: They may still assist their fellow Levites at the Tent of Meeting by helping with various responsibilities, but they must not perform the heavy service themselves. This is how you are to arrange the Levites' duties."
